name: Monkey.D.Luffy (OP09-061)
effect:
[DON!! x1] All of your Characters gain +1 cost.
[Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When 2 or more DON!! cards on your field are returned to your DON!! deck, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active, and add up to 1 additional DON!! card and rest it.

name: Nico Robin
effect: [On Play] DON!! -2 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

name: Monkey.D.Luffy (ST26-005)
effect: [On Play] / [When Attacking] DON!! -2 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): If your Leader is multicolored and your opponent has 5 or more DON!! cards on their field, your "Straw Hat Crew" type Leader's base power becomes 7000 until the end of your opponent's next End Phase.

name: Soba Mask
effect:
If you have a [San-Gorou] or [Sanji] Character with 7000 base power or more, give this card in your hand -5 cost.
[On Play] Return all of your [San-Gorou] and [Sanji] Characters to the owner's hand.

name: Tony Tony.Chopper
effect:
[Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
[On Play] DON!! -2 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Rest up to 1 of your opponent's DON!! cards or Characters with a cost of 1 or less.

name: General Franky
effect: [On Play] DON!! -2 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Give up to 2 of your opponent's Characters -2000 power during this turn.

name: San-Gorou (Reprint)
effect: DISCLAIMER: This card is a reprint of the pre-existing card in the OP05 set. The main difference between this card and the original print is the inclusion of "EN" on the right side, by the copyright information.

name: Jinbe (Reprint)
effect:
[Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
[Opponent's Turn] If you have 10 DON!! cards on your field, this Character gains +1000 power.

DISCLAIMER: This card is a reprint of the pre-existing card in the OP05 set. The main difference between this card and the original print is the inclusion of "EN" on the right side, by the copyright information.

effect:
[Main] DON!! 2 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 6000 power or less.
[Trigger] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

name: Gum-Gum Giant (Reprint)
effect:
[Counter] DON!! 2, You may trash 1 card from your hand: If your Leader has the "Straw Hat Crew" type, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, draw 2 cards.

DISCLAIMER: This card is a reprint of the pre-existing card in the OP09 set. The main difference between this card and the original print is the inclusion of "EN" on the right side, by the copyright information.
